16 - The third crossing happens between the two strands on the right.

14 - The fifth crossing happens between the two strands on the right.

20 - The seventh crossing happens between the two strands on the left.
24 - The eighth crossing happens between the two strands on the right.
22 - The ninth crossing happens between the two strands on the left.
8 - The tenth crossing happens between the two strands in the middle.
12 - The eleventh crossing happens between the two strands on the right.
6 - The twelfth crossing happens between the two strands on the left.
